location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Philip Durham Henderson, Foreign Department, Government of India to Colonel Lewis Pelly, CSI, Officiating Agent to the Governor-General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the Chiefs of Nuzzur, Pesheust and Khillat who have been invited to attend the Durbah in Agra and the arrangements that needed to be made for them to attend including provisions for Horses and Elephants.The verso of folio twenty-five gives a breakdown of the costs involved in bringing Horses and Elephants to the Durbah for each Chief.
